summary: Go httphelper improper input validation leads to SSRF.
details: The httphelper package does not properly validate upstream URLs, allowing server-side request forgery under certain configurations.

summary: Go authx IDOR allows access to other usersâ€™ resources.
details: Inadequate authorization checks in authx routes allow insecure direct object reference, enabling read access to other users' records.

summary: Go tplengine template injection in custom functions.
details: User-controlled template function names are not sanitized in tplengine leading to template injection and potential RCE in misconfigured deployments.
